revision.text:
{{also|encyclopædia}} ==English== [[File:EB-mat-Joerbicher w.jpg|thumb|right|300px|The 15th edition of the ''Encyclopaedia Britannica'' with its yearbook supplements.]]
===Etymology=== {{bor+|en|NL.|encyclopaedia}}; the English word is an etymologically restored spelling variant of earlier {{m|la|encyclopedia}}, q.v.
===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|en|/ɪnˌsaɪ.kləˈpi(ː).di.ə/|/ɛn-/|a=UK,US,Canada}} ... [truncated]
